ECSchema.description: Custom attributes to indicate BIS concepts.

ECEnumeration.description: Used with SchemaInfo to declare the schema author's intended layer for the schema.

ECEnumerator.name: Core
ECEnumerator.description: Schemas defining the 'fabric of the universe' and some key organizational strategies.

ECEnumerator.name: Common
ECEnumerator.description: Schemas defining abstract concepts and patterns used by multiple disciplines.

ECEnumerator.name: DisciplinePhysical
ECEnumerator.description: Schemas defining physical/spatial and closely associated concepts, in light of a specific discipline.

ECEnumerator.name: DisciplineOther
ECEnumerator.description: Schemas defining concepts from modeling perspectives other than physical, in light of a specific discipline.

ECEnumerator.name: Application
ECEnumerator.description: Schemas defining concepts that no other schema would need or want to reference. Product and iModel Connector schemas as well as dynamically-generated or user-customized schemas belong to this layer.

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Declares the author's design-intent details for this schema.

ECProperty.description: Indicates the layer in the BIS schema hierarchy that this schema targets.
